author: Gremlin
itunes:author: Gremlin
itunes:summary:
This episode we speak with Ryan Kitchens. Ryan is a Senior Software Engineer from the Core SRE team at Netflix.

Topics include: Comparing working on Reliability for World of Warcraft, Reliability at scale for Netflix, Chaos Monkey and Ironies of Automation, the optimal number of incidents, the false confidence in TTX, mental models, post-mortems & the myth of root cause, blame and conveying success to management.
